AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create & Invite
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create (missing) RfQ Responses and optionally send EMail Invitation/Reminder to Vendors to respond to RfQ

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Transaction Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report shows transaction details (receipts, shipments, inventory, movements, ...) including product instance (Lot, Serial No) info

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Clicks Monthy
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report shows active advertisement Click Count per Month.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Clicks Unprocessed
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Report shows Clicks, which could not be processed (URL not matched to Click Count)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Verify Tree
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Verify completeness and correctness of Tree

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Weekly Invoice
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced amount by Organization and Sales Rep

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Quarterly Invoice Customer by Product
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Invoice Report by Customer and Product Category per Quarter
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Customer and Product Category

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Quarterly Invoice Customer by Vendor
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Invoice Report by Customer and Product Vendor per Quarter
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Customer and Vendor (what customer bought from which vendor)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Transactions (Doc)
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the invoice transactiobs by invoice date

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Aging
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The aging report allows you to report on Open Items (Invoices). Select the aging buckets, you want to have in your report. If you select a currency, you get only invoices of that currency, otherwise the amounts are converted to your primary accounting currency. If you do not select a Statement Date, the system date is used to calculate the buckets. If you do not list the individual invoices, the Due Date is the earliest due date for the business partner and the Due Days are the average due days of all invoices.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Register Now!
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Registrations help us to better serve the Adempiere User Base.
AD_PROCESS.HELP: We will NOT make the data available to any third party or use the information for other than statistical purposes. It will help us, if you would allow to publish your use of Adempiere. We will contact you directly before we publish any information.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Warehouse Organization
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set and verify Organization ownership of Warehouse
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The process allows you to change or verify the organization ownership of a warehouse and its dependent entities (Location, Storage).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: UnReconciled Payments
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Payments not reconciled with Bank Statement
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists payments which are not reconciled with a bank statement. Payments with a zero payment amount are not listed.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Process Movements
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Process Inventory Movements will update inventory quantities based on the defined movements between warehouses or locations.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Lines
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy Lines from other Import Format

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Verify BOM
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Verify BOM Structure checks the elements and steps which comprise a Bill of Materials.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create/Post Production
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create production lines, if not created - otherwise process the production
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create/Post Production will generate the production lines and process the production. If the production lines already exists, the production will be processed

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Accounts
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy and overwrite Accounts to Products of this category
AD_PROCESS.HELP: If you copy and overwrite the current default values, you may have to repeat previous updates (e.g. set the revenue account, ...). If no Accounting Schema is selected all Accounting Schemas will be updated / inserted for products of this category.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Receipt from Invoice
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create and process delivery Receipt from this invoice.
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The invoice should be correct and completed.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Invoice from Receipt
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create and process Invoice from this receipt. The receipt should be correct and completed.
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Generate Invoice from Receipt will create an invoice based on the selected receipt and match the invoice to that receipt. You can set the document number only if the invoice document type allows to set the document number manually.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Prepare Payment
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Prepared Payments (Checks) to be paid
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You create the actual Payments via Payment Print/Export

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Set Project Type
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set Project Type and for Service Projects copy Phases and Tasks of Project Type into Project

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Price List
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Prices based on parameters of this version
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create Prices for this pricelist version in the sequence of the Discount Schema Price List. Lines with a higher sequence overwrite existing prices. The sequence should be from generic to specific.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Statement of Accounts
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Report Account Statement Beginning Balance and Transactions
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Select a Period (current period if empty) or enter a Account Date Range. You can select an alternative Reporting Hierarchy.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Inventory Count List
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The inventory count lines are generated. You can add new lines or delete lines manually.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Update Quantity
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: The Book Quantity is updated with current book quantity
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Update Quantity Process will update the book quantity with the current book quantity.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Process Inventory Count
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Process Inventory count and update Inventory

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Process Shipment
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Process Shipment/Receipt will move products out of/into inventory and mark line items as shipped/received.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Project Cycle Report
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Report Projects based on Project Cycle
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
The Project Cycle reports on common project phases of a Cycle Step/Phase. All Report information is weighted by the relative weight of the Cycle Step and converted to the currency of the Project Cycle (e.g. for Sales Funnel Reporting).

The Projects must have a Project Type, Phase and Currency defined. The Phase must be assigned to a Cycle Step.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Journal
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Customer Assets
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Report Customer Assets with Delivery Count
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the assets of business partners with the total asset delivery count.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Asset Delivery Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the details of Asset Deliveries for the records selected.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Issue to Project
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Issue Material to Project from Receipt or manual Inventory Location
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Select a Project and either
- Material Receipt
- Expense Report - Inventory Location, Product and Quantity The default Movement Date is today's date.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Get Price
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Get Price for Project Line based on Project Price List

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Inventory
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Bank Statement
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Quote convert
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Convert open Proposal or Quotation to Order
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can convert a Proposal or Quotation to any other Order document type. You would use this process, if you want to maintain/keep the Proposal or Quotation. The document status needs to be In Process.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: RePrice Order/Invoice
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Recalculate the price based on the latest price list version of an open order or invoice

AD_PROCESS.NAME: RfQ Unanswered
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Lists Responses of active RfQs (not closed/processed) where the Response is not marked as complete.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: RfQ Response
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Lists detail Responses of active RfQs (not closed/processed) where the Response is marked as complete.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Project Margin (Work Order)
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Work Order Project Lines (planned revenue) vs. Project Issues (costs)
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Project Margin Report for Work Orders compares the Project lines (planned revenue) against the Project issues (actual effort and costs). The margin amount is calculated by subtracting the costs (issue) from the revenue (line). The costs are in the currency of the Accounting Schema - the lines are in the currency of the price list of the project.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Sales Orders from Expense
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Sales Orders for Customers from Expense Reports

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create AP Expense Invoices
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create AP Invoices from Expenses to be paid to employees

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Window Tabs
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy all Tabs and Fields from other Window

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Set Print Format
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set for all Print Formats with same Landscape/Portrait

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy/Create
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy existing OR create Print Format from Table
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Select either a table to create a print format [creates initial rough layout] OR a print format to copy into the current print format [copies layout].

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Organization
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set and verify Organization ownership of Products
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
The process allows you to change or verify the organization ownership of Products and its dependent entities (BOM, Substitute, Replenish, Purchasing, Business Partner Info, Costing).
Select either a Product Category ar a specific Product.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Business Partner Organization
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set and verify Organization ownership of Business Partners
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
The process allows you to change or verify the organization ownership of Business Partners and its dependent entities (Location, Contact/User, Bank Account, Withholding).
Select either a Business Partner Group ar a specific Business Partner

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Sequence Check
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Check that System and Document sequences are correct. Run this process, if you get Duplicate Key error messages.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Orders
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create orders based on Distribution List line items
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Please note that due to rounding, the total quantity of the order(s) is likely to be higher then the quantity entered.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Tax
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Report lists Invoice Tax lines with Business Partner Tax information.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Cost Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Product Invoice Cost Detail Report lists the products with the individual invoice cost allocation

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Distribute Costs
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Distribute costs to Products based on selections - Distribution Base (Quantity, Current Costs, Line, Weight, ..) and Receipt/Line or directly to the product.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Add or Copy Accounts
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Add missing Accounts - or Copy&Overwrite Accounts (DANGEROUS!!)
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Either add missing accounts - or copy and overwrite all default accounts. If you copy and overwrite the current default values, you may have to repeat previous updates (e.g. set the bank account asset accounts, ...). If no Accounting Schema is selected all Accounting Schemas will be updated / inserted.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Accounts
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy and overwrite Accounts to Business Partners of this group
AD_PROCESS.HELP: If you copy and overwrite the current default values, you may have to repeat previous updates (e.g. set the receivebles account, ...)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Order Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report includes order detail information including lost sales. The report can be used for Sales and Purchasing.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Send Mail Text
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Send EMails to active subscribers of an Interest Area OR a Business Partner Group from a selected User
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Select the Interest Area to which subscribers you send the Mail Text from the User selected. Additionally, you can send mails to the Contacts of a Business Partner Group.
The User to send emails from needs to have valid EMail information. If you don't select a user, the Mail is sent from the Client's Request Mail User.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Print Format Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Print Format with Item details

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Auto Allocation
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Automatic allocation of invoices to payments
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Try to allocate invoices to payments for a business partner or group. You may want to reset existing allocations first.
The allocation is based on (1) payments entered with reference to invoices (2) payment selections (3) business partner balance (4) matching amount of invoice & payment. Allocation is based on exact amount and includes AP/AR imvoices/payments.
Optionally as (5), you can enable to allocate payments to the oldest invoice. In this case, there might be an unallocated amount remaining.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Reset Allocation
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Reset (delete) allocation of invoices to payments
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Delete Allocations for a business partner or business partner group, accounting date range or individual allocation. In contrast to "Void" in "View Allocation", the allocation is deleted (no trace), if the period is open.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Delete Import
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Delete all data in Import Table
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You would delete all data in an import table, if there was a problem with data loading. The delete does not distinguish between imported and not imported data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Accounting Fact Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Report with detail accounting details.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Accounting Fact Daily
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Accounting Fact Details summarized by Accounting Date
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the daily summary of accounting transactions

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Accounting Fact Period
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Accounting Fact Details summarized by Accounting Period
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Period is based on the the Calendar defined on Client level.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Un-Do Changes
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can undo certain changes.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Re-Do Changes
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can reapply certain changes.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Reapply Customizations
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: If you identified customizations in the Change Log, you can reapply them
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
The migration "resets" the system to the current/original setting. If selected in the Change Log, you can save the customization and re-apply them. Please note that you need to check, if your customization has no negative side effect in the new release.
Shut down the Application Server before running this process and set the Trace level (in Preference) higher or equals WARNING.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Weekly Invoice Prod Cat
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imvoice Report by Product Category per Week
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Product Category

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Monthly Invoice Vendor
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imvoice Report by Product Vendor per Month
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Vendor and Product Category

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Manage Activity
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Update or stop Workflow Activity

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Costing Records
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The costing records are created when needed or by batch processes. You can force the creation of the costing information here.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Payments
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create GL/Default
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy matching account element values from existing Accounting Schema
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create the GL and Default accounts for this accounting schema and copy matching account element values.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Cost Summary
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Product Cost report lists the summarized product costs for the product

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Synchronize Doc Translation
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
If the current client has not multi-lingual documents enabled, the translations for documents are synchronized with the main record (i.e. it copies the content of the main record to the translation records). This process is necessary when swiching to a mono-lingual environment as there the terminoligy is maintained not in the translation records.
This applies to the client defined document translations, e.g. for UoM, Payment Terms, Product Info, etc.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Material Reference
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report displays, e.g. where Material Receipts are used or Customer Shipments are resourced from

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Requests
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create invoice for Request Type with optional Request Group, Category for Business Partner. If the used product for invoicing is not defined, the product defined in the parameter is used.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Storage Cleanup
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create Inventory Movements for unbalanced Inventory Location Storage (i.e. within a warehouse move inventory to locations with negative on hand quantity).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Invoices
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Generate and print Invoices from open Orders
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoices for open Orders are created based on the invoice rule of the Order. If several Orders of a business partner have the same bill location, the orders can be consolidated into one Invoice.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Validate Workflow
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Validate thet the workflos is correct
AD_PROCESS.HELP: (limited checking)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Trial Balance
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Trial Balance for a period or date range
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Select a Period (current period if empty) or enter a Account Date Range. If an account is selected, the balance is calculated based on the account type and the primary calendar of the client (i.e. for revenue/expense accounts from the beginning of the year). If no account is selected, the balance is the sum of all transactions before the selected account range or first day of the period selected. You can select an alternative Reporting Hierarchy.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Project Lines not Issued
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Lists Project Lines of a Work Order or Asset Project, which are not issued to the Project

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Project POs not Issued
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Lists Project Lines with generated Purchase Orders of a Work Order or Asset Project, which are not issued to the Project

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Print Invoices
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Print Invoices to paper or send PDF
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
(Re)Print Invoices or send them as PDF attachments to the Business Partner Contact with a valid EMail addres.
Remark: If you only enter a Document No FROM value, all invoices greater or equal that document number are printed; you can alternatively use the % character as a widcard.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Test EMail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Test EMail Connection based on info defined. An EMail is sent from the request user to the request user. Also, the web store mail settings are tested.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Column Encryption
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
To enable storage encryption or remove encryption is dangerous as you may loose data. You need to verify that the column is big enough to hold the encrypted value. You can provide your own encryption method, but cannot change it once enabled.
The default implementation supports US ASCII String conversion (not Unicode, Numbers, Dates)
Note that support is restricted to setup and test, but not data recovery.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Cost
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Product Cost report lists the product costs for the product, cost type and cost element

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Order Batch Process
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Based on the selection criteria, the orders are processed using the document action selected. Make sure that the document action is valid for the documents.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: UnAllocated Invoices
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Report of not allocated Invoices (for partially paid/allocated invoices see Open Item)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: UnAllocated Payments
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Report of not allocated Payments (for partially allocated payments, use Payment Detail)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Workflow to Client
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Move custom workflow elements to the current client
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The security architecture prevents you from adding client specific modifications/customizations to existing standard workflows. This process moves your customization made on system level to this client to add client specific details.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product UOM Convert
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Brack-up or repackage same Products with different UOM
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Example: "Product EA" has a defined UOM Conversion to "Product 6Pack" and vice versa. This is a one-step replacement for defining BOM and creating/processes a Production.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Synchronize Terminology
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Synchronize the terminology within the system.
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Based on the entries in Window Element, the fields in windows, parameters, etc. are synchronized, if they are centrally maintained. Also synchronizes Language Translation.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Update Accounting Balance
AD_PROCESS.HELP: This process is run automatically

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Columns from DB
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Dictionary Columns of Table not existing as a Column but in the Database
AD_PROCESS.HELP: If you have added columns in the database to this table, this procedure creates the Column records in the Dictionary. Please be aware, that they may deleted, if the entity type is not set to User.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Fields
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Field from Table Column, which do not exist in the Tab yet
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Based on the table columns of this Tab, this procedure creates the missing Fields

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Resubmit Posting
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Resubmit posting of documents with posting errors or locked documents
AD_PROCESS.HELP: After resubmitting, the accounting engine will try to post the document again. You resubmit documents, if they are locked or when the document had posting errors - after fixing the cause (e.g. opening period).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Reset Accounting
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Reset Accounting Entries ** Stop Accounting Server before starting **
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Delete accounting records of documents to be re-created by the next run of the accounting engine. This is a dramatic step and you want to do this ONLY after changes of the accounting structure (e.g. different default accounts, etc.) and if fixing via manual Journal entries is not sensible.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Purchase Order
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Purchase Order(s) for RfQ Winner(s)
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create purchase order(s) for the resonse(s) and lines marked as Selected Winner using the selected Purchase Quantity (in RfQ Line Quantity) . If a Response is marked as Selected Winner, all lines are created (and Selected Winner of other responses ignored). If there is no response marked as Selected Winner, the lines are used.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Recompile DB Objects
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Recompile Functions, Procedures, Triggers, Views, etc.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Order
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Generate Order process will generate a new Order document based on the project phase. A price list and warehouse/service point must be defined on the project.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Lines
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy Commission Lines from other Commission

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Standard Cost Update
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Set standard and future cost price
AD_PROCESS.HELP: For Standard Costs you can set/recalculate the current or future cost price (for the cost type of the accounting schema). If the Costing Level of the Accounting Schema is set to Client, missing cost records are created. The historical costs are calculated based on the accumulated amount/quantity of the costing method.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Business Partners
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Products
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imports products from a file into the application
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Import Products will bring a file of products, in a predefined format into the application.

The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

If you select an existing price list and you have List, Standard, and Limit Price defined, they are directly created/updated.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Order
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Generate Order process will generate a new Order document based on the project phase or tasks. A price list and warehouse/service point must be defined on the project. If a product is defined on phase level, the Phase information is used as the basis for the Order (milestone invoicing) - otherwise the individual tasks.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Language Maintenance
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can Add Missing Translation entries (required after activating an additional System Language) - Delete Translation Records - or Re-Create the translation Records (first delete and add missing entries). Note that Adding the Missing Translation records creates them by copying the System Language (English). You would apply the Language Pack after that process. Run Syncronize Terminology after importing the translation.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Synchronize Column
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Change database table definition from application dictionary
AD_PROCESS.HELP: When selected, the database column definition is updated based on your entries in the Column definition of the Application Dictionary. Note that not all changes are supported by the database and may result in an error.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Load Bank Statement
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Load the bank statement into the import table. The parameters used depend on the actual loader.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Match Bank Statement
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Match Bank Statement Info to Business Partners, Invoices and Payments

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Payment
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Payment from Bank Statement Info

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Close RfQ
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Close the RfQ and all it's Responses

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Open Confirmation Details
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Open Shipment or Receipt Confirmation Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Report lists the open confirmation lines

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Open Confirmations
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the open confirmations

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Allocation
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report displays invoice allocations to payments and cash journals. Previous allocations are displayed as reversed.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Rank Responses
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Invalid responses are ranked with 999 per Quantity. The Quantity Responses are ranked among each other and the RfQ Best Response updated. The response Lines is maked as Selected winner, where the line quantity purchase quantity is selected. A total winner is only selected, if the RfQ type is "Quote All Lines" or "Quote Total only".
Then the rankings of all Quantity Responses are added for the total ranking of the response. The response with the lowest total ranking is marked as Selected Winner.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Sales Order
AD_PROCESS.HELP: A Sales Order is created for the entered Business Partner. A sales order line is created for each RfQ line quantity, where "Offer Quantity" is selected. If on the RfQ Line Quantity, an offer amount is entered (not 0), that price is used. If a magin is entered on RfQ Line Quantity, it overwrites the general margin. The margin is the percentage added to the Best Response Amount.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Check Complete
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Check if Response is Complete based on RfQ settings

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Manage Process
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Update or stop Workflow Process

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Confirmation
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The confirmations generated need to be processed (confirmed) before you can process this document

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Validate
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Validate generated Info Window SQL

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Open/Close All
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Change Period Status for all Period Controls of this Period

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Receivables Write-Off
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Write-off receivables causes the invoices selected by the criteria to be marked as paid and the open invoice amount to be written off. Alternatively you can create payments.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate PO from Sales Order
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Purchase Order from Sales Orders
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
After completing sales orders, you can create one or more purchase orders for each sales order. A purchase order references always only one sales order (i.e. no consolidation of sales orders). The Organization of the Sales Order is used to create the Purchase Order. If a (default) PO document type is defined on Organization level, that is used instead of the document types defined on Client level.
POs are created for all sales order lines where the product has a current vendor, the vendor has a Vendor Price List with all Products on the most current Price List Version. The Unit of Measure is copied; PO and SO can have different currencies.
Once the process is run, you need to synchronize the SO/PO manually (e.g. in case of additional lines and changed lines (product & quantity).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Monthly Invoice Product
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imvoice Report by Product per Month
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Product and Month

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Report Line Set
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Orders
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data. Note that only Prepare and Complete are valid document actions.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Accounts
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Import accounts and their hierarchies and optional update the default accounts. Updating the Default Accounts changes the natural account segment of the used account, e.g. account 01-240 becomes 01-300). If you create a new combination, the old account (e.g. 01-240) will remain, otherwise replaced. If you select this, make sure that you not multiple default accounts using one natural account and HAVE A BACKUP !!

The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Deliver Assets
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Send Mail to customers and attach new delivery (optional).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invite & Remind
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: EMail Invite or Remind Vendor to answer RfQ
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Send Invitation/Reminder to Vendors to respond to RfQ per email

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Vendor Selection
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Products with more than one vendor
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Vendor Selection is initiated when there is a product that is supplied by more than one vendor. It allows the selection of a specific vendor for a Purchase Order.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Open Orders
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Orders with quantities to deliver (Backordered) or quantities to invoice

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Columns
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy Report Columns from other Column Set
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Copy columns at the end of this Column Set. Please note that you need to re-set the calculation operands.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Lines
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy Report Lines from other Line Set
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Copy lines at the end of this Line Set. Please note that you need to re-set the calculation operands.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Transaction Summary
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report shows transaction summary for stored products

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Monthly Invoice
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced amount by Organization and Sales Rep

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Cache Reset
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Reset Cache of the System ** Close all Windows before proceeding **
AD_PROCESS.HELP: To increase performance, Adempiere caches repeatedly used data. This process clears the local cache.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Storage Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report shows storage details including product instance (Lot, Serial No) info

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Detail & Margin
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Report lists Customer and Vendor Invoice Details with Margines.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Product Transaction Value
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report shows product transactions with current vendor prices

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Validate Business Partner
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Check data consistency of Business Partner
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Check the payments and invoices of a business partner and checks the balances.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Calculate Measures
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Calculate/update the actual measure.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: UnLink Business Partner Org
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: UnLink Business Partner from an Organization
AD_PROCESS.HELP: UnLink a Business Partner Linked to an Organization (for explicit inter-org documents)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Confirmations
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Capture + Calculate Measures
AD_PROCESS.HELP: If automatic, capture measures - and calculate/update the actual measure.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Quarter Invoice Product
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imvoice Report by Product per Quarter
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Product and Quarter

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Shipments for Vendor RMA
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Generate Shipments from open vendor RMA based on selection.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Invoices for Vendor RMA
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Generate Invoices from open vendor RMA based on selection.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Generate Shipments
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Generate and print Shipments from open Orders
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Shipments for open Orders are created based on the delivery rule of the Order and the relative order priority. If a Promise Date is selected only orders up to (including) the date are selected.
If several Orders of a business partner have the same location, the orders can be consolidated into one Shipment.
You can also include orders who have outstanding confirmations (e.g. ordered=10 - not confirmed shipments=4 - would create a new shipment of 6 if available).

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Print Dunning Letters
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Print Dunning letters to paper or send PDF
AD_PROCESS.HELP: (Re)Print Dunning Letters or send them as PDF attachments to the Business Partner Contact with a valid EMail addres.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Not Realized Gain/Loss
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Invoice Not Realized Gain & Loss Report
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
The Report lists not fully paid invoices with open amount, the GL amounts and the revalued amounts. If an invoice is partially paid, the percentage of the open amount is used to calculate the revaluation amount.
If you select a currency, only invoices of that currency are included; if you select Include All Currencies, all invoices are included and you can use the report to reconcile your AP/AR accounts.
If you select a GL Document Type, a GL Journal is created. Note that the report only includes posted invoices.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Report
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The default period is the current period. You can optionally enter other restrictions. You can select an alternative Reporting Hierarchy.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create PO from Requisition
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create Purchase orders from Purchase Requisitions.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Replenish Report
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Report lists products to be replenished. Note that a product can have only one current vendor. If there are more then vendor per product, both records are reset. You need to select a current vendor manually.
Movements are only created, if a sourcing warehouse is defined for the warehouse to be replenished.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Inventory Valuation Report
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Report lists products with their on-hand quantity and values at the valuation date. In addition to several prices, standard costs and an optional other cost element is used to calculate the inventory of the particular warehouse.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: PackIn
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Import a package

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Details
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Copy Journal/Lines from other Journal Batch

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Import Invoice
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Parameters are default values for null import record values, they do not overwrite any data. Note that only Prepare and Complete are valid document actions.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Verify Document Types
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Verify Document Types and Period Controls
AD_PROCESS.HELP:
Makes sure that there is a DocumentType for all Document Base Types
Creates missing Period Controls for Document Type (You may have to open them)

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Invoice Transactions (Acct)
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the invoice transactions by accounting date

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Daily Invoice
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced amount by Organization and Sales Rep

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Deploy Web Project
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The process deploys the media to the media server(s) and then copies the stage to the container.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Verify BOMs
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The Verify BOM Structures checks the elements and steps which comprise a Bill of Materials.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Register Extension
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can register the four character extension with Adempiere. This makes sure that your extension can be automatically distributed and implemented. You will also be able to certify extensions. Contact Adempiere for details.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Rebuild Index
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Be carefull, this process will reindex all tables and records which are marked to get indexed. Depending on the number of documents this could take a long time. This should only be run if you have removed stop words, if this is mentioned to be run after migration.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Monthly Invoice Prod Cat
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Imvoice Report by Product Category per Month
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Invoiced Amount by Product Category

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Open Items
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Displays all unpaid invoices for a given Business Partner and date range. Please note that Invoices paid in Cash will appear in Open Items until the Cash Journal is processed.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Payment Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Type adjusted payments (receipts positive, payments negative) with allocated and available amounts

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Business Partner Open
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists open invoices and payments

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Commission Run Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Commission Run, Amount Details with Order/Invoice details

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Business Partner Detail
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report list details of Business Partner, Addresses and Contacts for any active Business Partner with an Address and Contact

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Validate Support
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The process connects to the Adempiere Support Services server and validates the support contract. To sign up for support, please go to http://www.adempiere.org

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Asset Delivery Month
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Report Asset Deliveries Summary per month
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report lists the Asset and the deliveries per month for the records selected.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Copy Columns from Table
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Dictionary Columns for a Table taking another as base

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Order From RMA
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Creates an order based on this RMA Document. The RMA should be correct and completed.
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Generate Order from RMA will create an order based on this RMA document.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Reset Password
AD_PROCESS.HELP: You can change User Passwords and EMail settings. You do not need to know/enter the password, if you are an Administrator.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Dunning Run
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create Dunning Run Entries based on the Dunning Level criteria

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Inventory Move Print
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create/Copy your own Format and Process

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Physical Inventory Print
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Create/Copy your own Format and Process

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Material Receipt Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report provides Material Repecipt Header and Line with locator information.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Shipment Details
AD_PROCESS.HELP: The report provides Material Shipment Header and Line with locator information. You can use the report to create a Consolidated Picking List.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Role Access Update
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Update the access rights of a role or roles of a client
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Update the access rights of a role or all roles of a client to windows, forms, processes and workflows. If run for System, all roles of all clients are updated. Note that a role is only updated if it is not marked as manual.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Create Orders
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Create orders based on Distribution List line items
AD_PROCESS.HELP: Please note that due to rounding, the total quantity of the order(s) is likely to be higher then the quantity entered.

AD_PROCESS.NAME: Link Organization
AD_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Link Business Partner to an Organization
AD_PROCESS.HELP: If the Business Partner is another Organization, select the Organization or set to empty to create a new Organization. You link a Business Partner to an Organization to create explicit Documents for Inter-Org transaction. If you create a new Organization, you may supply a Organization Type. If you select a Role, the access to the new Organization is limited to that role, otherwise all (non manual) roles of the Client will have access to the new Organization.
